statements: SELECT * FROM infrastructure_projects;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date FROM infrastructure_projects;
SELECT * FROM infrastructure_projects WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM infrastructure_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, location, impact_assessment FROM infrastructure_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM infrastructure_projects WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM infrastructure_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, impact_assessment FROM infrastructure_projects WHERE impact_assessment LIKE '%positive%' AND end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM infrastructure_projects WHERE location = 'California' AND impact_assessment IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, project_name, impact_assessment FROM infrastructure_projects WHERE impact_assessment IS NULL ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM environmental_impact_assessments ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, location FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, end_date FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE end_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments
SELECT project_name, location FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT project_id, COUNT(document_id) AS total_documents FROM project_documents GROUP BY project_id
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT project_name, location, document_type FROM environmental_impact_assessments JOIN project_documents ON environmental_impact_assessments.project_id = project_documents.project_id
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessment;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM project_stakeholders ORDER BY stakeholder_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(stakeholder_id) AS num_stakeholders FROM project_stakeholders GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM impact_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessment;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_location, end_date FROM environmental_impact_assessment ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, stakeholder_name, stakeholder_type FROM project_stakeholders JOIN environmental_impact_assessment ON project_stakeholders.project_id = environmental_impact_assessment.project_id;
SELECT * FROM impact_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessment;
SELECT project_name, assessment_date FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE impact_category = 'Air Quality';
SELECT location_name, country FROM project_location ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT investor_name, investor_type, investment_amount FROM project_investors WHERE investment_amount > 1000000;
SELECT project_name, assessment_date, impact_category FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND assessment_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessment ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, country, longitude, latitude FROM environmental_impact_assessment INNER JOIN project_location ON environmental_impact_assessment.emp_project_id = project_location.location_id;
SELECT investor_name, investor_type, investment_amount FROM project_investors WHERE investment_amount > 1000000;
SELECT project_name, assessment_date, impact_category FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE impact_category = 'Water' ORDER BY assessment_date ASC;

SELECT project_name, start_date, completion_date FROM environmental_impact_assessment JOIN project_timeline ON environmental_impact_assessment.emp_project_id = project_timeline.project_id ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM infrastructure_projects;
SELECT project_name, location, estimated_cost FROM infrastructure_projects;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact WHERE impact_rating > 3;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM infrastructure_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT stakeholder_name, organization, type FROM stakeholders WHERE type = 'Government';
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date, estimated_cost FROM infrastructure_projects;
SELECT * FROM assessments JOIN stakeholders ON assessments.stakeholder_id = stakeholders.stakeholder_id;
SELECT project_name, location, end_date FROM infrastructure_projects WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT project_name, impact_description, impact_rating FROM infrastructure_projects JOIN environmental_impact ON infrastructure_projects.project_id = environmental_impact.project_id;

SELECT project_name, stakeholder_name, organization FROM infrastructure_projects JOIN assessments ON infrastructure_projects.project_id = assessments.project_id JOIN stakeholders ON assessments.stakeholder_id = stakeholders.stakeholder_id;
